name: Modern Sniper City: Cop Killer
description:
Modern Sniper City: Cop Killer is a 3D shooting Game. Become the shooter sniprer in this action filled frontline fps, set in an immersive escape environment. The global terrorists have attacked your territory & now you are on the call to fight in the critical mission of terror war. Be ready to strike as fps shooter for survival.
Features :
- Realistic and modern 3D graphics
- Upgradable weapons
- Variety of cars to destroy
- Amazing modern sound effects
- Immersive gameplay physics
- Smooth realistic controls
